title: section 24 of the Taxi Regulation Act 2013 (No. 37 of 2013 as amended), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxi Regulation (Maximum Fares) Order
text_raw: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxi Regulation (Maximum Fares) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited taxi regulation (maximum fares) order

title: section 24 of the Taxi Regulation Act 2013 (No. 37 of 2013 as amended), hereby
section 24 of the Taxi Regulation Act 2013 (No. 37 of 2013 as amended), hereby
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 01 December 2024.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 01 December 2024.

title: section 24 of the Taxi Regulation Act 2013 (No. 37 of 2013 as amended), hereby
heading: In this Order “public holiday” has the same meaning as it has in
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order “public holiday” has the same meaning as it has in 
paragraphs 1 and 2 of the Second Schedule to the Organisation of Working Time 
Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of the 
following weekday.
text_norm: 3 order public holiday meaning paragraph 1 2 second schedule organisation working time act 1997 addition public holiday fall sunday following weekday

title: section 24 of the Taxi Regulation Act 2013 (No. 37 of 2013 as amended), hereby
heading: 4. The fares contained in the Schedule are fixed as the maximum fares and
text_raw:
4. The fares contained in the Schedule are fixed as the maximum fares and 
charges that may be charged by the driver of a taxi in respect of a journey 
undertaken in the State. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [479] 3
text_norm: 4 fare contained schedule fixed maximum fare charge may charged driver taxi respect journey undertaken state notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 27th september 2024 479 3

Saturday

Special Rate for Weekend Nights, Christmas & New Year: To be 
displayed in the Rate/Tariff Window as 3 
A special rate applies every Saturday and every 
Sunday from 00.00 hours to 04.00 hours, and between 
Christmas Eve 20:00h to St. Stephens Day 08:00h and 
New Years Eve 20:00h to New Years Day 08:00h. 

Changeover Speed (at all times)

title: section 24 of the Taxi Regulation Act 2013 (No. 37 of 2013 as amended), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order sets the maximum fares that may be charged by the driver of a taxi 
in respect of a journey undertaken in the State in line with the table contained in 
the Schedule to the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [479] 7
